overview:
Ali “Pooyan” Khorram is the Founder and CEO of Cliq. He has 15 years of experience in the telecom, broadband, wireless, and technology sectors with cross-functional responsibilities ranging from product development, operations, mergers and acquisitions, and corporate development. He has both depth and breadth in his transaction experience and years of operational experience in building, growing, and leading companies.

Prior to founding Cliq, he was CFO of Clearband, a fixed wireless broadband provider, a founding Principal of GPX Enterprises, an investment and advisory firm, GPX Realty Partners, a real estate investment firm, Senior Vice President of Corporate Development for ATX Communications Inc., an officer of ATX-CoreComm, Inc., and a Board member of the Association of the Communications Companies of America, the largest telecoms buying consortium in the US.

Khorram earned an MBA from Columbia Business School and an MBA from London Business School. He also holds a Bachelor of Arts in Political Science, cum laude, from Gettysburg College.
